pkgmetadata.longdescription: Enhances Interaction with 'ODBC' Databases // Provides simple and powerful interfaces that facilitate interaction with 'ODBC' data sources. Each data source gets its own unique and dedicated interface, wrapped around 'RODBC'. Communication settings are remembered between queries, and are managed silently in the background. The interfaces support multi- statement 'SQL' scripts, which can be parameterised via metaprogramming structures and embedded 'R' expressions.
